name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pasta alla Carbonara
description: Pasta with eggs, guanciale (cured pork cheek), pecorino cheese, and black pepper.

name: Pasta Aglio e Olio
description: Spaghetti with garlic, olive oil, and chili flakes.

name: Gnocchi
description: Potato dumplings served with mushrooms and truffle sauce.

name: Lasagna
description: Authentic Lasagna with tomato sauce, meat and parmesan cheese.

name: Tiramisù
description: Italian dessert made with ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, eggs, and cocoa.
